name: Ext_R4_MedicationDispense_medication
title: Cross-version Extension for R4.MedicationDispense.medication[x] for use in FHIR R5
description: This cross-version extension represents MedicationDispense.medication[x] from http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/MedicationDispense|4.0.1 for use in FHIR R5.

element.definition: Identifies the medication being administered. This is either a link to a resource representing the details of the medication or a simple attribute carrying a code that identifies the medication from a known list of medications.
element.comment: `MedicationDispense.medication[x]` maps to R5 `MedicationDispense.medication`. Has no type mapping So is mapped as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget.

element.definition: Identifies the medication being administered. This is either a link to a resource representing the details of the medication or a simple attribute carrying a code that identifies the medication from a known list of medications.
element.comment: `MedicationDispense.medication[x]` maps to R5 `MedicationDispense.medication`. Has no type mapping So is mapped as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget.

binding.description: A coded concept identifying which substance or product can be dispensed.
